rules_text:
First strike
When this creature transforms into Lethe, Fierce Cat put four time counters on her.
[i]Laguz Gauge[/i] – At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter from Lethe, then if she has no time counters on her, transform her.
[i]Claw [/i]– Whenever Lethe attacks, target Non-Human creature gets +2/+0 until end of turn.
